mil5.5.4:1.2_0: ‘tathāgato bhikkhave, arahaṁ sammāsambuddho anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā’ti.
mil5.5.4:1.4_0: ‘addasaṁ khvāhaṁ, bhikkhave, purāṇaṁ maggaṁ purāṇaṁ añjasaṁ pubbakehi sammāsambuddhehi anuyātan’ti.
mil5.5.4:1.5_5: purāṇaṁ maggaṁ purāṇaṁ añjasaṁ pubbakehi sammāsambuddhehi anuyātan’ti yaṁ vacanaṁ,
mil5.5.4:1.7_2: purāṇaṁ maggaṁ purāṇaṁ añjasaṁ pubbakehi sammāsambuddhehi anuyātan’ti,
mil5.5.4:1.7_5: arahaṁ sammāsambuddho anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā’ti tampi vacanaṁ micchā.
mil5.5.4:1.8_0: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.
mil5.5.4:2.2_0: ‘tathāgato, bhikkhave, arahaṁ sammāsambuddho anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā’ti.
mil5.5.4:2.4_2: purāṇaṁ maggaṁ purāṇaṁ añjasaṁ pubbakehi sammāsambuddhehi anuyātan’ti,
mil5.5.4:2.4_5: tathāgatānaṁ antaradhānena asati anusāsake maggo antaradhāyi,
mil5.5.4:2.4_6: taṁ tathāgato maggaṁ luggaṁ paluggaṁ gūḷhaṁ pihitaṁ paṭicchannaṁ asañcaraṇaṁ paññācakkhunā sampassamāno addasa pubbakehi sammāsambuddhehi anuyātaṁ,
mil5.5.4:2.5_0: ‘addasaṁ khvāhaṁ, bhikkhave, purāṇaṁ maggaṁ purāṇaṁ añjasaṁ pubbakehi sammāsambuddhehi anuyātan’ti.
mil5.5.4:3.1_1: tathāgatānaṁ antaradhānena asati anusāsake luggaṁ paluggaṁ gūḷhaṁ pihitaṁ paṭicchannaṁ asañcaraṇaṁ maggaṁ yaṁ dāni tathāgato sañcaraṇaṁ akāsi,
mil5.5.4:3.2_0: ‘tathāgato, bhikkhave, arahaṁ sammāsambuddho anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā’ti.
mil5.5.4:4.1_1: rañño cakkavattissa antaradhānena maṇiratanaṁ girisikhantare nilīyati,
mil5.5.4:4.2_0: “Na hi, bhante, pākatikaṁyeva taṁ maṇiratanaṁ, tena pana nibbattitan”ti.
mil5.5.4:4.3_1: pākatikaṁ pubbakehi tathāgatehi anuciṇṇaṁ aṭṭhaṅgikaṁ sivaṁ maggaṁ asati anusāsake luggaṁ paluggaṁ gūḷhaṁ
mil5.5.4:4.3_2: pihitaṁ paṭicchannaṁ asañcaraṇaṁ bhagavā paññācakkhunā sampassamāno uppādesi,
mil5.5.4:4.4_0: ‘tathāgato, bhikkhave, arahaṁ sammāsambuddho anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā’ti.
mil5.5.4:5.1_0: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, santaṁyeva puttaṁ yoniyā janayitvā mātā ‘janikā’ti vuccati;
mil5.5.4:5.2_1: tathāgato santaṁyeva maggaṁ luggaṁ paluggaṁ gūḷhaṁ pihitaṁ paṭicchannaṁ asañcaraṇaṁ paññācakkhunā sampassamāno uppādesi,
mil5.5.4:5.3_0: ‘tathāgato, bhikkhave, arahaṁ sammāsambuddho anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā’ti.
mil5.5.4:6.1_1: koci puriso yaṁ kiñci naṭṭhaṁ passati,
mil5.5.4:6.2_1: tathāgato santaṁyeva maggaṁ luggaṁ paluggaṁ gūḷhaṁ pihitaṁ paṭicchannaṁ asañcaraṇaṁ paññācakkhunā sampassamāno uppādesi,
mil5.5.4:6.3_0: ‘tathāgato, bhikkhave, arahaṁ sammāsambuddho anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā’ti.
mil5.5.4:7.1_1: koci puriso vanaṁ sodhetvā bhūmiṁ nīharati,
mil5.5.4:7.1_4: taṁ bhūmiṁ kāraṇaṁ katvā bhūmisāmiko nāma hoti;
mil5.5.4:7.2_1: tathāgato santaṁyeva maggaṁ luggaṁ paluggaṁ gūḷhaṁ pihitaṁ paṭicchannaṁ asañcaraṇaṁ paññāya sampassamāno uppādesi,
mil5.5.4:7.3_0: ‘tathāgato, bhikkhave, arahaṁ sammāsambuddho anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā’”ti.
